description: The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) needs drones and several payloads.
full_summary:
---

### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title
F2402-220103B: Drones and Cameras

#### Reference Number
WS3620527629-Doc3735833944

#### Publication Date
November 9, 2022

#### Closing Date and Time
December 5, 2022, 2:00:00 PM EST

#### Solicitation Number
WS3620527629

#### Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is seeking proposals for the establishment of a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISo) for the procurement of unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) and several payloads.

#### Contract Description
The RISo shall be for a period of one (1) year with an option for one (1) additional year. The delivery point shall be at 501 University Crescent, Winnipeg, MB R3T 2N6. The procurements' main objective is to support the Fishery and Ocean Canada's operational requirements, specifically acquiring UAVs equipped with various payloads for environmental monitoring, research, and enforcement activities.

#### Solicitation Method
The solicitation process is competitive and open to all eligible suppliers. The evaluation criteria for the RFSO are based on the lowest price.

#### Trade Agreements
This solicitation is covered by various trade agreements, including the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, among others.

#### Key Contact
The point of contact for this solicitation is Shelley Unser, Acting Executive Vice President, PSPC Procurement. She can be reached at:
* Email: [shelley.unser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shelley.unser@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Tender Documents
The tender documents, including the solicitation document and the evaluation criteria, can be accessed on the Ariba Discovery website at the following link: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14591411?extsite=MTQ1OTE0MTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14591411?extsite=MTQ1OTE0MTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
